reviewText:
16028  The Clark Terry Quartet
The Duke Jordan Trio
Recorded on Ben Webster's birthday Easter Sunday April 7, 1985 at the Club Montmartre in Copenhagen, Denmark. Clark Terry is a master on trumpet and especially on flgelhorn here playing with the highly respected pianist Duke Jordan, Jimmy Woode on bass and Svend Erik Nrregaard on drums. 7 great classics with Terry, and a session with the Duke Jordan Trio with Jesper Lundgaard on bass and ge Tanggaard on drums. Great modern "main stream" jazz.
